descriptionHtml:
Gazen the Argonian .A normal NPC and also a Companion to everyone.Warrior style and Marksman Style .
Of course,just need some require for the character looks .Looks Bulky...in 100 percent in Samson.
You can find him in Whiterun Bannered Mare or sometimes he will walk around the Cloud District or the Market.

Problem: 1- Okay if your companion got problem with body(Male only).(Means turn to original look in 0 Samson).When you load it take your companion                         with you.Then go in other houses or Inns to let him turn back in Samson 100 or Click him and Disable him then type Enable let him                                     come back to see the weight .(Everyone know this after all)

Problem: 2-All right.This will be a little weird about the skin Textures.Maybe is my problem...Now when you found your Companion (Make it by your own)
                 you will call him to follow you.Then wait for 2 or 3 minutes .Suddenly the skin textures turn back to the Nord Skin.
                (Argonian and Khajit Problem I guess...or maybe the NPC Editor,I forgot to plugin the SAM).You guys can try out for testing.Then you know how
                 to create a companion with SAM.That's all of it.Good Luck !

Name-Gazen
Voice-Male Argonian 
Combat Style-HumanBoss 1H
Relationships-Player's Ally
Factions-You can Marry him for figthing against Bosses or Dragons...or you just want to see his Bulky Body.

Also give me your Images when you found Gazen and give me some post that you got :)

Credits 
Thanks to the Mod Creators or Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
The requirement needed for the NPC is...
Warrior Within Weapons by [b]BloodFree        (Look Awesome)[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42280/?
Osare Food by [b]anano                     (For Fun)     (Delicious Desert)
[/b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24759/?
Faction Crossbows by [b]Deserter X                (More Long Shot)
[/b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58704/?
FAR - Forgotten Argonian Roots by [b]redtox                (For Argonians better Textures) (Maybe...)
[/b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42043/?
The Best Male Idle Animations by [b]Dualsun and 001001001              (More Handsome or Awesome Look)
[/b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42103/?                       
SAM-Shape Atlas for Men-(Hall of Torque)         (This one is needed)-(SAM-Core-Textures-Armors)           (Give your Skin more Shiny)
http://www.ladymoiraine.com/forum/index.php?action=downloads;cat=34

Well...That's all of it !!!      
Please Enjoy my New Companion.
author: CyrusHawke
